clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Right ovary shows mildly thickened appearance.
Gallbladder shows hypoechoic, no stones or wall thickening.
Testes are mildly thickened with normal vascularity.
Common bile duct measures 18.04 mm, within normal limits.
Placenta is coarse and normally located.
Thyroid gland shows well-defined echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
